welcome_message_body: Welcome to Espejo, Chile! Get ready to immerse yourself in the charming atmosphere of this picturesque city, known for its stunning natural landscapes and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Espejo has to offer.

restaurants.name: Pasteleria El Parron
restaurants.description: Pasteleria El Parron is a bakery located in the city.

restaurants.name: Picara Pajara
restaurants.description: Picara Pajara is a pizzeria located in San Miguel.
restaurants.address: Primera Transversal (Octava Avenida), San Miguel, Metropolitana de Santiago de Chile

restaurants.name: Tanta
restaurants.description: Tanta is a peruvian restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: Johnny Rockets
restaurants.description: Johnny Rockets is a burger joint located in Santiago de Chile.
restaurants.address: Mall Plaza Oeste, Santiago de Chile, Metropolitana de Santiago de Chile

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Arturo Merino Benitez Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used primarily for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may be limited in certain areas.
